name: Introduction-jee
body:
### Software required

Jboss Application Server 7.1 community edition http://download.jboss.org/jbossas/7.1/jboss-as-7.1.1.Final/jboss-as-7.1.1.Final.zip

Eclipse development tool IDE https://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/keplersr2

Mysql Database Server http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/

Bootstrap CSS framework https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/releases/download/v3.1.1/bootstrap-3.1.1-dist.zip

squirrel SQL cliente http://squirrel-sql.sourceforge.net/#installation
Last edited by capablaza, 3 days ago
